amendment.description: An amendment numbered 63 printed in Part B of House Report 118-272 to reduce funding, by $2 million, for the Department of Education to the Office of Indian Education.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A025) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A025) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A025) Agreed to by voice vote.
